description: Strengthening the resilience of the communities and the local health system in Donetsk and Luhansk Oblast (GCA) through improved availability and access to high-quality multidisciplinary basic health services (including SRH and MHPSS) for the population affected by the conflict, with special attention to particularly vulnerable population groups.
The aim is to strengthen the resilience of the IDPs affected by the conflict and of the vulnerable host communities through the social services provided.
